analyzed: de'i tshe blo las gzhan pa'i rgyu las skyes pa rang gi chos yin na 'khrul pa can du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de la smras ba /

analyzed: ma rtogs de yi 'bras bu gzhan //

analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po la sogs pa'i tshogs ni de'i rtags ma yin no //

analyzed: de yang ma yin te /

original: gzugs mthong ba las skyes pa gang //
analyzed: gzugs mthong ba las skyes pa gang //

original: / zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la /

original: de la gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas dbang po dang shes pa gnyis ni mngon sum ste /
analyzed: de la gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi nang nas dbang po dang shes pa gnyis ni mngon sum ste /

original: de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu 'am rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni 'bras bu 'am rtags ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that is not the effect or mark.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i don lnga'i nang nas don gang zhig gzugs mthong ba las skyes pa'i don gcig kyang mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i don lnga'i nang nas don gang zhig gzugs mthong ba las skyes pa'i don gcig kyang mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: Of the five objects, form, etc., one object is not seen from the production of seeing form.

original: de lta yin na gzugs mthong ba ma rtogs pa la gsal ba srid pa can te ma byas pa skye ba can yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na gzugs mthong ba ma rtogs pa la gsal ba srid pa can te ma byas pa skye ba can yin no //
translated: If that were so, there would be the possibility of clarity, i.e., the production of that which is not done, in the non-realization of seeing form.

analyzed: de ltar shes bye gang yin te // rtags yin zer ba bzhad gad rgyu //

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: dngos po gang zhig de ltar bsgrub bya med na med pa dang / rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis shes pa ma yin pa de ni nyi bar gyur pa tsam gyis blo'i rtags yin no zhes zer ba 'di dag ni @161a * //
translated: What is that thing which, if the probandum is absent, it is also absent, and which is not known by its own nature? You claim that it is a sign of the mind merely by its presence.

original: shin tu bzhad gad kyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: shin tu bzhad gad kyi rgyu yin no //
translated: This is a cause for great laughter.

original: mngon sum gyi nyams su myong ba ma rtogs pa gzugs la sog pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi nyams su myong ba ma rtogs pa gzugs la sog pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The experience of direct perception does not understand the nature of form, etc.

original: de bas na rtags nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rtags nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not a sign.

original: yang na don rtogs pa yin du chug na yang de lta mod kyi rtags ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na don rtogs pa yin du chug na yang de lta mod kyi rtags ni ma yin te /
translated: Or, even if it is granted that it understands the object, still it is not a sign.

original: rtags yod pa dag yin na yang //
analyzed: rtags yod pa dag yin na yang //
translated: Even if the sign exists,

original: de dang lhan cig de mthong med //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig de mthong med //
translated: And it is not seen together with it.

original: ji ltar rtogs te rtags dag ni //
analyzed: ji ltar rtogs te rtags dag ni //
translated: How is it known? The sign

original: ma mthong na ni gsal byed min //üîΩzhes bya ba la //
analyzed: ma mthong na ni gsal byed min // zhes bya ba la //
translated: is not manifest if it is not seen.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags yod na yang /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags yod na yang /
translated: Here, even if there is a sign of form, etc.,

original: blo de gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de dang lhan cig mthong ba med pa'i skyes bu'i blo ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur /üîΩgang gi phyir rtags ni sngar ma mthong bar gsal bar byed pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: blo de gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de dang lhan cig mthong ba med pa'i skyes bu'i blo ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur / gang gi phyir rtags ni sngar ma mthong bar gsal bar byed pa ma yin zhing /
translated: how is it known that the cognition is the cognition of a person who does not see the sign of form, etc., together with that sign?

original: mthong ba nyid kyi me'i du ba las nges pa skye ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on te gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de nyid las blo snga ma shes shing /
analyzed: mthong ba nyid kyi me'i du ba las nges pa skye ba'i phyir ro // 'on te gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de nyid las blo snga ma shes shing /
translated: Because the sign is not manifest if it is not seen before, and ascertainment arises from seeing smoke as a sign of fire.

original: de'i rjes la rjes su dpog pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la rjes su dpog pa ste /
translated: But if the prior cognition is known from that very sign of form, etc., and then it is inferred,

original: gang mngon sum gyis mthong ba nyid kyi don la rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la nges pa yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang mngon sum gyis mthong ba nyid kyi don la rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la nges pa yod pa ma yin no zhe na /

original: rtags de nyid las 'di snga bar //
analyzed: rtags de nyid las 'di snga bar //

analyzed: grub pa yin par smra na ni //

analyzed: dpe gzhan bsgrub par bya ba nyid //

analyzed: de la yang zhes thug med 'gyur ; / zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In that case, there would be an infinite regress.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de nyid las blo la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sngar 'brel pa shes pa'i dus su blo khas len par byed na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rtags de nyid las blo la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sngar 'brel pa shes pa'i dus su blo khas len par byed na /
translated: If you accept that the object of comprehension, such as cognition, is established by the evidence, such as form, at the time of knowing the relation between them,

original: de'i dpe la yang dpe gzhan dgos pas /
analyzed: de'i dpe la yang dpe gzhan dgos pas /
translated: then another example would be needed for that example,

original: dpe med par rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpe med par rjes su dpag pa mi 'jug pa'i phyir thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: because without an example, inference would not operate.

original: 'on te don gyis go bas blo shes so zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te don gyis go bas blo shes so zhe na /
translated: But if you say that cognition is known by implication,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: gal te blo grub na de'i tshe gzhan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: gal te blo grub na de'i tshe gzhan ci zhig yod /
translated: If cognition is established, then what else is there?

original: gal te rtogs par ma grub pas don rtogs pa mi skye'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtogs par ma grub pas don rtogs pa mi skye'o zhe na /
translated: But if it is not established as the object of comprehension, then the arising of the understanding of the object would not occur.

original: 'o na don rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
analyzed: 'o na don rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /

analyzed: rtogs pa nyid khong du ma chud par rtogs pa'i yul nyid du de ma grub pa ma yin nam /

analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa ni mdun na gnas pa nyid yin no zhe na mdun na gnas pa yang ma rtogs par blo yis ji ltar go bar 'gyur /
translated: But if it is the object that is realized, then it is present in front of the mind. How can the mind understand it without realizing it?

original: 'on te mdun na gnas pa rtogs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te mdun na gnas pa rtogs pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is the object that is present in front of the mind that is realized,

analyzed: de'i tshe de la yang mdun du gnas @161b pa gzhan yod pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bas na mdun na gnas pa'am gzhan yang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, whether it is the object present in front of the mind or another object,

analyzed: don gyi chos blo grub par byed pa la rtags ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: it is not a reason for establishing the object in the mind.

original: de phyir blo las don grub kyi //
analyzed: de phyir blo las don grub kyi //
translated: Therefore, the object is established from the mind,

original: don las de ni nam yang min //
analyzed: don las de ni nam yang min //
translated: but never from the object.

original: de ma grub na don rang nyid //
analyzed: de ma grub na don rang nyid //
translated: If it is not established, the object itself

original: rab tu grub pa med phyir ro //üîΩzhes smos te /
analyzed: rab tu grub pa med phyir ro // zhes smos te /
translated: is not established at all.

analyzed: de lta bas na blo las don grub kyi / don rtogs pa 'am ma rtogs pa las de ni nam yang grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object is established from the mind,üîΩbut never from the object, whether it is realized or not.

original: blo de ma grub par yang don rang nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo de ma grub par yang don rang nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the mind is not established, the object itself is not established at all.

original: gang gi tshe blo nyid kyis don la khyab par mthong ba de'i tshe de yis rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe blo nyid kyis don la khyab par mthong ba de'i tshe de yis rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: When the mind itself sees that it pervades the object, then it would understand the object.

original: de lta ma yin na ci yang rtogs pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ci yang rtogs pa med par 'gyur te /

analyzed: rang nyid kyis thams cad rtogs par mi 'gyur te blo'i byed pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It would not understand everything because the activity of the mind would not be seen.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / mngon sum blo ni mthong nas kyang //üîΩde yi g-yo 'gul brjod la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan yang / mngon sum blo ni mthong nas kyang // de yi g-yo 'gul brjod la sogs //
translated: Even though the mind directly perceives itself,

original: gzhan sems rjes dpog mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: gzhan sems rjes dpog mi 'gyur te //
translated: it does not infer the movement of another‚Äôs mind

original: bdag 'brel mthong ba med phyir ro //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag 'brel mthong ba med phyir ro // zhes bya ba la /
translated: because it does not see the connection with itself.

original: khyod kyi lugs kyis bdag nyid la blo mngon sum gyis ma mthong bar de'i g-yo 'gul te lus kyi bsgul bskyod dang brjod pa ste /
analyzed: khyod kyi lugs kyis bdag nyid la blo mngon sum gyis ma mthong bar de'i g-yo 'gul te lus kyi bsgul bskyod dang brjod pa ste /
translated: In your system, since the mind does not see itself directly, it sees the movement of another‚Äôs body, that is, the movement of the body, and the expression of another‚Äôs mind, that is, the expression of the body, and so on.

original: lus kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong nas /
analyzed: lus kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong nas /
translated: Seeing the effect of another‚Äôs mind, it infers the existence of another‚Äôs mind in the continuum of another.

analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i gzhan gyi sems rjes su dpog par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But it does not infer the existence of another‚Äôs mind in the continuum of another because it does not see the connection with itself.

original: bdag nyid la blo dang g-yo 'gul la sogs pa 'brel par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid la blo dang g-yo 'gul la sogs pa 'brel par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we do not see any connection between the self and the mind, or between the mind and the body.

original: ma mthong ba yang blo mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma mthong ba yang blo mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And we do not see the mind, because it is not directly perceptible.

original: de bas na gzhan gyi sems rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan gyi sems rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, we do not know the minds of others.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang // yid kyi blo yang ma yin te //üîΩdon rtags grub pa med phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang // yid kyi blo yang ma yin te // don rtags grub pa med phyir ro //
translated: the mind is not the mental organ,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: because the existence of the sign of the object is not established.

original: rjes su dpog par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsnyegs so //
analyzed: rjes su dpog par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsnyegs so //
translated: The meaning of this is that it is not inferred.

original: gal te don mthong nas blo rjes su dpog na ni de'i tshe yid kyi blo la don yod pa ma yin na de la rtags kyis ci zhig byed /
analyzed: gal te don mthong nas blo rjes su dpog na ni de'i tshe yid kyi blo la don yod pa ma yin na de la rtags kyis ci zhig byed /
translated: If the mind is inferred from the perception of the object, then the mental organ does not exist for the mind, so what use is a sign to it?

original: don med pa yang 'das pa ni 'gags la ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir dang / yul la sogs pa chod pa'i don yang 'dzin par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa yang 'das pa ni 'gags la ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir dang / yul la sogs pa chod pa'i don yang 'dzin par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if the object does not exist, then the past has ceased and the future has not yet arisen, and the object that is obstructed by a wall, etc., is also perceived.

analyzed: gzhan du na don thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan zin to //
translated: Otherwise, it would be as we have already explained: everything would be seen.

original: de lta na ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa na /
translated: As long as the mind is not seen at the time of seeing the object, it is apprehended later by another cognition.

original: g-yo 'gul la sogs pa'i bya bas rjes su dpog par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: g-yo 'gul la sogs pa'i bya bas rjes su dpog par byed do zhe na /
translated: In that case, it is inferred by the action of movement, etc.

original: de la smras pa /üîΩkhyod kyi blo yang blo gzhan gyis //
analyzed: de la smras pa / khyod kyi blo yang blo gzhan gyis //
translated: To that we reply:

original: ji ltar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ;üîΩ/ zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ji ltar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ; / zhes bya ba la /
translated: How will your mind be illuminated by another mind?

original: khyed kyi lugs kyis shes pa gzhan gyis blo snga ma ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur te ma yin no //
analyzed: khyed kyi lugs kyis shes pa gzhan gyis blo snga ma ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur te ma yin no //
translated: In your system, how will the previous mind be illuminated by another cognition? It will not be!

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

analyzed: gsal min bdag mtshungs pa yi phyir // gang la gsal bya gsal byed dngos //

analyzed: nyams su myong ba med par mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are the same in not being experienced.

analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu bzhin gsal bar bya ba dang / gsal bar byed par ji ltar 'gyur te ma yin no //
translated: How can there be that which is illuminated and that which illuminates, like a pot and cloth?

original: 'di ltar gsal bas mi gsal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar gsal bas mi gsal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed de /
translated: In this way, the clear illuminates the unclear pot, etc.

original: yul ni ji ltar gsal ba yin //
analyzed: yul ni ji ltar gsal ba yin //
translated: How is the object clear?

original: gsal la ngo bo 'pho phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal la ngo bo 'pho phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the clear is transferred.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: gal te mi gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyi gsal ba ma yin na yul yang bems po yin pa'i phyir /üîΩgsal ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te mi gsal ba'i bdag nyid kyi gsal ba ma yin na yul yang bems po yin pa'i phyir / gsal ba ma yin par 'gyur te /
